titles.title: Commending hospice care providers such as Hospeace House for allowing people with life-limiting illness or injury to die pain-free and with dignity.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 2/1/2006--Introduced. Recognizes Hospeace House and the rest of the nation's hospice providers for caring for people who have months rather than years to live. Encourages hospice providers to establish community partnerships.
